hero.subtitle: HR Consulting & Talent Solutions for Ambitious Businesses
hero.title: Your Growth Partner
hero.description: We empower startups and SMEs to scale smarter—through AI-driven recruitment, agile HR systems, and people strategies that drive real business results.

recruitment.title: recruitment
recruitment.description: We help you attract, assess, and hire top talent using AI-powered tools and structured recruitment strategies tailored to your business needs.

part-time.title: Full-Time Outsourcing
part-time.description: End-to-end workforce management for long-term roles—managed by us, embedded with you.

full-time.title: Part-Time Outsource
full-time.description: Flexible staffing models for startups and scaling companies who need experienced support without long-term commitments.

hr-operations.title: HR Operations Outsourcing
hr-operations.description: From payroll and compliance to documentation and employee records—we handle your HR backend so you can focus on the business front.

hr-consultation.title: HR Consultancy
hr-consultation.description: We work side-by-side with business owners and HR teams to build smarter, scalable HR systems. From performance frameworks and grading structures to culture-building and compliance—we don’t just consult, we co-create.
